name: Countinental
tagline: An app for counting things. Made with Fuse
body:
# Countinental

### An app for counting things

Countinental does one job, count. Use it to track the amount of coffee you drink, or how many meeting you attend on a monthly basis. The interaction is simple, swipe left to increase a counter, swipe right to decrease.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
